college_story_clocks.description: Tracks College of Winterhold storyline progression and related quest clocks

saarthal_expedition_logistics.name: Saarthal Expedition Progress
saarthal_expedition_logistics.notes: Tracks team progress through Saarthal ruins. 1=briefed; 2=arrive; 3=inner halls; 4=draugr encounter; 5=inner threshold reached; 6=Eye chamber.
advancement_triggers: Team departs College and reaches Saarthal dig site

student_safety_pressure.name: Student Safety Pressure
student_safety_pressure.notes: Tracks accumulated stress, injuries, and morale issues among student team. 0=safe/confident; 8=crisis/mutiny/casualties.
advancement_triggers: Leadership failures or poor tactical decisions

eye_of_magnus_discovery.name: Eye of Magnus — Discovery Arc
eye_of_magnus_discovery.notes: Tracks progress toward unveiling the Eye of Magnus artifact. 0=unknown; 1=rumors; 2=first sighting; 3=ancano involved; 4=crisis escalates; 5=containment breach; 6=resolution.
advancement_triggers: Discover ancient texts or artifacts referencing the Eye
First encounter with the Eye in Saarthal
Ancano takes interest in the Eye

college_internal_politics.name: College Internal Politics
college_internal_politics.notes: Tracks growing tensions between faculty, Thalmor presence (Ancano), and Arch-Mage Aren's authority. Higher values indicate more political instability.
advancement_triggers: Faculty disputes over research ethics or methods
Ancano's influence grows among certain faculty

staff_of_cinders_awakening.name: Staff of Cinders — Awakening
staff_of_cinders_awakening.notes: Oskern's artifact slowly awakens through mythic deeds and resonance with ancient power. Unlocks new traits/stunts as clock advances.
advancement_triggers: Using the staff in moments of legend or myth
Resonance with ancient Nordic sites or dragon magic
Proximity to powerful artifacts (Eye of Magnus, etc.)

ancano_suspicion_meter.name: Ancano's Suspicion of PC
ancano_suspicion_meter.description: Tracks Ancano's awareness of the PC as a potential threat to his plans with the Eye of Magnus. Higher values mean more active countermeasures.
ancano_suspicion_meter.completion_effect: Ancano actively sabotages the PC or attempts to neutralize them as a threat.
advancement_triggers: PC displays exceptional magical power publicly (+1)
PC grows close to faculty members who distrust Ancano (+1)
PC questions Ancano directly or challenges his authority (+2)
PC discovers Eye of Magnus secrets (+2)
ancano_suspicion_meter.notes: [2026-02-15] +1 from ice wolf Fireball display; +2 from Fire Breath Thu'um use in Saarthal (ancient Nordic power displayed to students).

gm_guidance.saarthal_focus: The Saarthal expedition is the immediate narrative driver. Use the logistics clock to pace the dungeon crawl and student survival challenges.
gm_guidance.eye_arc: The Eye of Magnus discovery should be foreshadowed but not rushed. Let it emerge naturally from Saarthal exploration.
gm_guidance.politics: College politics simmer in the background. Use them to create social complications and compel opportunities.
gm_guidance.staff_awakening: The Staff of Cinders awakening is a long-term character arc. Advance slowly and deliberately based on player choices.
gm_guidance.ancano_suspicion: Track Ancano's growing awareness of the PC. At higher levels, he becomes an active antagonist rather than just a suspicious observer.
